Package dao

Class CrudContactDao

java.lang.Object
dao.CrudContactDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContactDao
public class CrudContactDao extends Object implements ContactDao
CrudContactDao implements ContactDao interface. CrudContactDao is in charge of CRUD operations. Instead of using JDBC or SQL database, the information is read from and stored in "contacts.csv" file in src directory.
Author:
Topias Laatu

    • CrudContactDao

  • Method Details

    • getAllContacts

      public List<Contact> getAllContacts()
      The method is used to read the contacts.csv file and return a List object. The method reads the csv file using Scanner row by row, utilizing the split method to place temporarily the different attributes separated by commas in the rows, which are then placed in a new Contact object, which in turn is placed inside a List containing Contact objects. The List object is utilized in other CrudContactDao methods and it is also given to AppList object, which displays the information in GUI.
      Specified by:
      getAllContacts in interface ContactDao
      Returns:
      l = the List object containing Contact objects.

      public Contact getContact(String id)
      Specified by:

    • addContact

      public boolean addContact(Contact c)
      This method adds a new contact into contacts.csv The method takes a Contact object as parameter. Filewriter object is utilized to add a new contact.
      Specified by:
      addContact in interface ContactDao
      Parameters:
      c -
      Returns:
      boolean value, depending if the adding is successful or not.

    • removeContact

      public boolean removeContact(Contact con)
      This is used for removing contacts from the csv file. It is assumed that the contact to be removed has been selected in the GUI and the method then rewrites the csv file with the selected contact removed.
      Specified by:
      removeContact in interface ContactDao
      Parameters:
      con -
      Returns:
      boolean value to give information if the deletion is succesful or not

    • updateContact

      public boolean updateContact(Contact con)
      This method is used for changing information of a certain contact within the csv file The contact, whose information has been changed in the GUI, is given as the parameter. Only the ID is not to be changed. The ID is used for identifying purposes, as the ID is used for finding the contact from the list, then given the changed information, and finally the csv file is rewritten with the changed contact information.
      Specified by:
      updateContact in interface ContactDao
      Parameters:
      con -
      Returns:
      A boolean value is returned to give information, if the update was successful or not.
